EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
DNC 09.
1. VESSEL, 32 PERSONS ON BOARD, DISABLED
   AND ADRIFT IN VICINITY 34-25.00N 018-48.00E
   AT 211741Z OCT.
   VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO
   KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE.
   REPORTS TO  JRCC LIBYA,
   PHONE: 2189 1034 9739, 2182 1444 9149,
   FAX: 2182 1360 6868,
   E-MAIL: LMRCC.1@MOD.GOV.LY,
   LMRCC.2@MOD.GOV.LY,
   OR REPORTS TO MRCC ROME,
   INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
   PHONE: 3906 5908 4409, 390 6592 4145,
   FAX: 390 6592 2737, 3906 5908 4793,
   E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
2. CANCEL HYDROLANT 2676/22.
